thread.title: New Vamps video features Brooklyn Beckham and product placement
thread.title_full: New Vamps video features Brooklyn Beckham and product placement

title: New Vamps video features Brooklyn Beckham and product placement
text: Monday, Oct 5 2015, 09:37 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ The new Vamps video features an entirely original concept - namely teenagers telling everybody else to get out of bed.The video for 'Wake Up' premiered yesterday online (October 4) and features the boy band hanging out with none other than Brooklyn Beckham.It begins with the ever-rebellious Vamps strolling through a suburban neighbourhood.A mysterious hooded figure then rolls out of bed (presumably after three o'clock in the afternoon), runs across his roof and lets off a flare before jumping off the roof.He then reveals himself to be Brooklyn Beckham.With the help from some nifty product placement, of course, a large group of kids then transmit the Vamps' mass alarm clock idea with a performance from the top of a transmission tower.It had been previously revealed that Beckham would appear in the new Vamps video, posting on Instagram a picture of himself hanging out with the group in August.The Vamps' new album, also titled Wake Up , will be out November 27.The group will tour next year, stopping at London's O2 Arena for two nights.
